posts.title: Integrating Google Forms as a Backend: Lessons from Server Restrictions
posts.excerpt: What started as a simple reCAPTCHA integration evolved into a complete pivot to external services when faced with restrictive server environments. Here's what happened and what I learned.

posts.title: Automation and safety loops in solo projects
posts.excerpt: A look at how small defensive layers like reCAPTCHA shape the broader automation strategy for solo projects, balancing speed with reliability.

posts.title: Lessons in building products: small bets, fast feedback
posts.excerpt: This short essay covers product lessons I've learned while shipping small projects: ship small, get feedback, iterate.
